2/2/1988: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,233,571 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/24/1988, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...

2/2/1989: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,233,571 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/4/1989, hitting .545 with 1 HR, 3 RBI...
2/2/1990: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,233,571 through salary arbitration...
Traded from Cincinnati to Seattle on 4/3/1990 (Going to CIN: P Kevin Appier. Going to SEA: P Jason Bere, P Tom Browning, 3B Chris Sabo)...
Injured on 5/1/1990 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Seattle on 2/3/1991 to a 3-year deal worth $3,700,000 per year...
